item.text: Currently in the job market (Q1 2024) looking for full-time remote position, anything senior level regarding UI/UX design and/or frond end development. Contact me at 215-421-4627.
Work on NicholasDavis.com's responsive design to finalize the website (due date: Feb 7th 2024).
Next, build an angular app using Apollo Angular Client and Graphql (due date: Feb 20th 2024).
